Text: RE roll call for skiing Cc PST Jen my flight gets into Oakland at pm on Thursday night we could meet up for drinks somewhere in the city or EBay depending upon who else wants to join in the festivities I guess i gotta rise and shine early on Friday morn tho Tues morning is also an option just prob more difficult unless you wanna play hookey from work and we could meet at Abirs for coffee any other takers for drinks on Feb th come on there must be some lonely hearts out thar Jo On Feb Jen Faught wrote Those are great pics Hey Jo Im expecting to be around th and th and would love to see ya Let me know the plan Whoops should have just replied to you Oh well Jen Send and receive Hotmail on your mobile device hi have i told you how much i miss all yall i cant commit ive already planned a minivacation around PresDay wknd and while i may be able to meet up in Tahoe around March I wont know till last minute if you do get enuff people on the slate pls keep me in the email loop ill just sleep on the floor love Jo ps i just picked up photos today from a mystery roll i just found pps if anyone can meet me for a latenight drink on feb th or breakfastlunch on Tuesday the th pls let me know bay area that is On Jan Tang Grace wrote hi everone Im trying to get a feel for who may be interested in a south lake tahoe ski shindig I looked into the place we rented years ago when cooper flew down from portland via reno on the snowiest day of the year and it is available as soon as March Yeah not that soon maybe this will give the sky a chance to bear snow Between people nights a hottub fireplace heavenly company etc it would cost about person for the weekend Let me know what weekends onafter March would work for you and how many people including yourself may like to come let it snow let it snow let it snow G
